chunks.zh: 上班没活干的时候大家都在做什么
chunks.en: What does everyone do when they have nothing to do at work?

chunks.zh: 最近没有什么活干了，上班有点无聊，大家平时没有任务时都会做些什么？
chunks.en: Recently, there hasn't been much work to do, and it's a bit boring at work. What do you all usually do when you don't have any tasks?

chunks.zh: 是学习新的技术吗？
chunks.en: Do you learn new technologies?

chunks.zh: 还是摸鱼
chunks.en: Or slack off?

chunks.zh: 我自己感觉没有活干的时候反而上一天班更累了，虽然一直在工位坐着啥也不做。
chunks.en: I personally feel that it's even more tiring to work a day when there's nothing to do, even though I'm just sitting at my desk doing nothing.

chunks.zh: 如果有任务的时候反而充实一些
chunks.en: When there are tasks, it feels more fulfilling.

chunks.zh: 在上 v 站看上班没活干的时候大家都在做什么
chunks.en: Reading 'What does everyone do when they have nothing to do at work?' on V2EX

chunks.zh: 我上了十年班都还没遇到这种时候……
chunks.en: I've been working for ten years and haven't encountered this situation...

chunks.zh: 但是有任务不妨碍我刷 v2
chunks.en: But having tasks doesn't stop me from browsing V2EX.

chunks.zh: 学习，总有一天，你的公司会对你不满意，或者，你会对你的公司不满意，得做知识储备
chunks.en: Study, because one day your company will be dissatisfied with you, or you will be dissatisfied with your company, so you need to build up your knowledge reserves.

chunks.zh: 看 pornhub
chunks.en: Watch Pornhub

chunks.zh: 上班 - 开机 - google - v -回车
chunks.en: Work - Start up - google - v - Enter

chunks.zh: Watch English video on Youtube, learning English, learning technology and a lot of knowledge.
chunks.en: Watch English video on Youtube, learning English, learning technology and a lot of knowledge.

chunks.zh: 1. 翻文档，看看之前每个项目的 README 文件。
chunks.en: 1. Go through the documentation and look at the README files of each previous project.

chunks.zh: 总结成单独文件，将来卷铺盖交接的时候能更迅速
chunks.en: Summarize them into separate files so that handover will be faster when you pack up your bags and leave in the future.

chunks.zh: 2. 继续看学英语的 RSS 文章
chunks.en: 2. Continue reading RSS articles for learning English.

chunks.zh: 3. 看看项目框架的新版本又有什么新坑等着填
chunks.en: 3. See what new pitfalls the new version of the project framework has waiting to be filled.

chunks.zh: v2 、tophub 、hupu 、zhihu 、bilibili
chunks.en: v2ex, tophub, hupu, zhihu, bilibili

chunks.zh: @zhumengyang tophub 这个网站好啊，已收藏
chunks.en: @zhumengyang Tophub is a great website, I've bookmarked it.

chunks.zh: 学习→淘汰你的公司
chunks.en: Study → Your company eliminates you.

chunks.zh: 摸鱼→公司淘汰你
chunks.en: Slacking off → The company eliminates you.

chunks.zh: 摸鱼啊 看帖子 小说 刷抖音
chunks.en: Slack off, read posts, novels, browse Douyin

chunks.zh: 看帖子，群聊，看资讯，看技术
chunks.en: Read posts, group chats, read news, read technology

chunks.zh: 在刷 v2
chunks.en: Browsing v2ex

chunks.zh: 在这里/小红书/无声 Youtube
chunks.en: Here / Little Red Book / Silent Youtube

chunks.zh: 整本地 LLM 部署,看哪个好用,虽然服务太丐,跑起来的基本都是辣鸡
chunks.en: Deploy a local LLM and see which one is easy to use. Although the services are too basic, the ones that can run are basically trash.

chunks.zh: 在上 v 站看上班没活干的时候大家都在做什么
chunks.en: Reading 'What does everyone do when they have nothing to do at work?' on V2EX

chunks.zh: 每天早上先打开 v2 看看，然后打开 rss 看看有没有博客更新，reddit 随便翻几页，github Trending 之类的翻一翻，然后就被人拉去开会或者拉别人开会去了
chunks.en: Every morning I open v2ex first, then open rss to see if there are any blog updates, flip through a few pages on reddit, flip through github Trending, and then I get pulled into a meeting or pull others into a meeting.

chunks.zh: 不过你这种情况，我觉得找个具体的目标，比如做个什么自己的项目之类的，不然大片的时间很容易过去。
chunks.en: But in your case, I think you should find a specific goal, such as doing your own project or something, otherwise a lot of time will easily pass.

chunks.zh: V 站 L 站 nga 小红书 挨个刷刷一天就过去了
chunks.en: Browse V2EX, L site (likely bilibili), nga, Little Red Book one by one, and a day will pass.

chunks.zh: 在刷 v2 看上班没活干的时候大家都在做什么
chunks.en: Browsing v2ex, reading 'What does everyone do when they have nothing to do at work?'

chunks.zh: 当然是点开这个帖子啦～
chunks.en: Of course, I'm clicking on this post!～
